page.title: 16NW.SHERBORNE:EMPLOYMENT
page.content: In this area there are no big {factories}or other large places of work. Most of the population travel to other parts of Sherborne or to nearby towns like{Yeovil}for their work. There are two small factories near the junction of Bristol Road and the A.30. One of these, employing about 70 people at the peak of the season, makes{carbonated and soft drinks,} bottles Guiness and imports wine. The other, smaller business, manufactures gloves.{Glove-making}used to be an industry for which the area was noted. There are also a few very{small {workshops}in the area including the following businesses: tool-grinding, wood preservation, builder's yard, coach hire and a motor-cycle repair workshop.
